Text: Thanks for the upload Tv Team. It is appreciated by SOME people that you upload these JJs.

THANKS. 

Again, i'm amazed that JJ torrents are rare.  I mean one of the most syndicated shows on the planet, the highest ratin, highest paid , longest running daytime show and uploads ANYWHERE are haphazard at best.  

No i do not want 4000 choices of each episode of desperate housewives or teen vampire shite.

OH, PRO TIP FOR EVERYONE!!

Don't clean your bathroom with bleach to remove mold. Bleach isn't good at killing it , it just removes the colour but mold is still there growing. 

Use Methylated Spirits , it literally explodes the cell walls of the mold.   Way cheaper and less hazardous to your health.
